AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Search Key
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A fast method for finding a particular record.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: A search key allows you a fast method of finding a particular record. If you leave the search key empty, the system automatically creates a numeric number. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_TableName", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Storage Bin
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A set of coordinates (x, y, z) which help locate an item in a warehouse.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Locator ID indicates where in a Warehouse a product is located.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Order Date
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: The time listed on the order.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: Indicates the Date an item was ordered.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Movement Date
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: The date that a certain item is moved from one location to another.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Movement Date indicates the date that a product moved in or out of inventory. This is the result of a shipment, receipt or inventory movement.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Service Point
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: The location where products arrive to or are sent from.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Warehouse identifies a unique Warehouse where products are stored or Services are provided.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Movement Type
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: The type of a certain item being moved from one location to another.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Movement Type indicates the type of movement (in, out, to production, etc)

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Service Point
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: The location where products arrive to or are sent from.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Warehouse identifies a unique Warehouse where products are stored or Services are provided.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Business Partner
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: Anyone who takes part in daily business operations by acting as a customer, employee, etc.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: A Business Partner is anyone with whom you transact. This can include Vendor, Customer, Employee or Salesperson

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Sales Order
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A unique and often automatically generated identifier for a sales order.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Sales Order ID is a unique identifier of a Sales Order. This is controlled by the document sequence for this document type.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Accounting Date
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: The date this transaction is recorded in the general ledger.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Accounting Date indicates the date to be used on the General Ledger account entries generated from this document

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Product
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: An item produced by a process.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: Identifies an item which is either purchased or sold in this organization.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Tab
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: An indication that a tab is displayed within a window.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Tab indicates a tab that displays within a window.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Window
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A work area which can be used to create, view, edit, and process a record.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Window field identifies a unique Window in the system.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Invoice Date
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: The time listed on the invoice.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Date Invoice indicates the date printed on the invoice.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Sales Order
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A unique and often automatically generated identifier for a sales order.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Sales Order ID is a unique identifier of a Sales Order. This is controlled by the document sequence for this document type.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Business Partner
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: Anyone who takes part in daily business operations by acting as a customer, employee, etc.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: A Business Partner is anyone with whom you transact. This can include Vendor, Customer, Employee or Salesperson

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Organization
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: Organizational entity within client
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Price List Version
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A price list with a specified validity range.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: Each Price List can have multiple versions. The most common use is to indicate the dates that a Price List is valid for.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DEFAULTVALUE: @SQL=SELECT MIN(M_PRICELIST_VERSION_ID) AS TOTAL FROM M_PRICELIST_VERSION M, C_BPARTNER B WHERE M.M_PRICELIST_ID = (CASE @isSOTrx@ WHEN 'Y' THEN B.M_PRICELIST_ID ELSE COALESCE(B.PO_PRICELIST_ID, B.M_PRICELIST_ID) END) AND M.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND B.C_BPARTNER_ID = @C_BPARTNER_ID@

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Contract Date
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: The date a contract is registered into the application.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The contract date is used to determine when the document becomes effective. This is usually the contract date. The contract date is used in reports and report parameters.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Ending Date
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: The date that a task, process, or action is to be completed or delivered by.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The finish date is used to indicate when the project is expected to be completed or has been completed.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Commission
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: Commission Identifier
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Commission ID is a unique identifier of a set of commission rules.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Starting Date
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A parameter stating when a specified request will begin.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Start Date indicates the first or starting date of a range.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Period Action
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: Action taken for this period
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Period Action indicates the action to be taken for this period. For example 'Close Period' or 'Open Period'.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Product
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: An item produced by a process.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: Identifies an item which is either purchased or sold in this organization.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Project
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A defined task or undertaking
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: Project ID is a user defined identifier for a Project

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Activity
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A distinct activity defined and used in activity based management.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: Activities indicate tasks that are performed and used to utilize Activity based Costing

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Sales Region
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A defined section of the world where sales efforts will be focused.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Sales Region indicates a specific area of sales coverage.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Sales Campaign
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: An advertising effort aimed at increasing sales.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Campaign defines a unique marketing program. Projects can be associated with a pre defined Marketing Campaign. You can then report based on a specific Campaign.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Sales Transaction
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: An indication that a transfer of goods and money between business partners is occurring.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Sales Transaction checkbox indicates if this item is a Sales Transaction.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Period
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A specified time period.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Period indicates an exclusive range of dates for a calendar.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Account
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: The identification code used for accounting.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The (natural) account used

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Business Partner
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: Anyone who takes part in daily business operations by acting as a customer, employee, etc.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: A Business Partner is anyone with whom you transact. This can include Vendor, Customer, Employee or Salesperson

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Accounting Date
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: The date this transaction is recorded in the general ledger.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Accounting Date indicates the date to be used on the General Ledger account entries generated from this document

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Accounting Schema
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: The structure used in accounting including costing methods, currencies, and the calendar.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: An Accounting Schema defines the rules used in accounting such as costing method, currency and calendar

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Project
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A defined task or undertaking
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: Project ID is a user defined identifier for a Project

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Report Line Set
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: x not implemented

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Document No.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: An often automatically generated identifier for all documents.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The document number is usually automatically generated by the system and determined by the document type of the document. If the document is not saved, the preliminary number is displayed in "<>".If the document type of your document has no automatic document sequence defined, the field is empty if you create a new document. This is for documents which usually have an external number (like vendor invoice). If you leave the field empty, the system will generate a document number for you. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Target Payment Rule
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: How you pay the invoice
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Payment Rule indicates the method of invoice payment.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Client
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: Client for this installation.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Delete old imported records
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: Before processing delete old imported records in the import table
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: Before processing delete old imported records in the import table

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Client
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: Client for this installation.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Delete old imported records
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: Before processing delete old imported records in the import table
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: Before processing delete old imported records in the import table

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Organization
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: Organizational entity within client
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Document Action
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A means of changing the transaction status of the document.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: You find the current status in the Document Status field. The options are listed in a popup

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Organization
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: Organizational entity within client
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Document Action
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A means of changing the transaction status of the document.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: You find the current status in the Document Status field. The options are listed in a popup

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Test
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: Execute in Test Mode
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: Execute in Test Mode

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Interest Area
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: Interest Area or Topic
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: Interest Areas reflect interest in a topic by a contact. Interest areas can be used for marketing campaigns.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Mail Template
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A template used to organize and send mail using a standard format.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Mail Template indicates the mail template for return messages.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: User/Contact
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: An acquaintance to reach for information related to the business partner.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The User identifies a unique user in the system. This could be an internal user or a business partner contact

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Business Partner Category
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A classification of business partners based on defined similarities.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Business Partner Group ID provides a method of defining defaults to be used for individual Business Partners.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Invoice
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A document listing products, quantities and prices, payment terms, etc.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Invoice ID uniquely identifies an Invoice Document.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Sales Order
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A unique and often automatically generated identifier for a sales order.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Sales Order ID is a unique identifier of a Sales Order. This is controlled by the document sequence for this document type.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Project
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A defined task or undertaking
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: Project ID is a user defined identifier for a Project

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Journal Batch
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: General Ledger Journal Batch
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The General Ledger Journal Batch identifies a group of journals to be processed as a group.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Project Type
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A distinct project characteristic used for processes and sometimes grouped within a category.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: Type of the project with optional phases of the project with standard performance information

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Project Cycle
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: Identifier for this Project Reporting Cycle
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: Identifies a Project Cycle which can be made up of one or more cycle steps and cycle phases.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Client
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: Client for this installation.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Organization
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: Organizational entity within client
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Storage Bin
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A set of coordinates (x, y, z) which help locate an item in a warehouse.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Locator ID indicates where in a Warehouse a product is located.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: Before processing delete old imported records in the import table
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: Before processing delete old imported records in the import table

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Movement Date

AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Movement Date indicates the date that a product moved in or out of inventory. This is the result of a shipment, receipt or inventory movement.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: Validate the date and do not process
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: Validate the date and do not process

AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: Only start the import, if there are no validation Errors
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: Only start the import, if there are no validation Errors

AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A classification of assets based on similar characteristics.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The group of assets determines default accounts. If an asset group is selected in the product category, assets are created when delivering the asset.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Ending Date
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A parameter stating the ending time range related for a specified request, query, etc.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Date To indicates the end date of a range (inclusive)

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Project
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A defined task or undertaking
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: Project ID is a user defined identifier for a Project

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Service Point
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: The location where products arrive to or are sent from.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Warehouse identifies a unique Warehouse where products are stored or Services are provided.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: ABC
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: ABC classification according to a Pareto distribution
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: ABC classification according to a Pareto distribution

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Order Date
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: The time listed on the order.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: Indicates the Date an item was ordered.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Business Partner
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: Anyone who takes part in daily business operations by acting as a customer, employee, etc.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: A Business Partner is anyone with whom you transact. This can include Vendor, Customer, Employee or Salesperson

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Price List
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: A catalog of selected items with prices defined generally or for a specific partner.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: Price Lists are used to determine the pricing, margin and cost of items purchased or sold.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Organization
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: Organizational entity within client
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.

AD_PROCESS_PARA.NAME: Service Point
AD_PROCESS_PARA.DESCRIPTION: The location where products arrive to or are sent from.
AD_PROCESS_PARA.HELP: The Warehouse identifies a unique Warehouse where products are stored or Services are provided.
